thumb.title: Black Sun feat.宮舞モカ / エオリア
thumb.description: Lyrics&Music:Aeoriaオフボーカル音源:https://drive.google.com/file/d/1A65g00bGCBdUfZXOJoC8iQg2_ygX8UKa/view?usp=drive_linkDarkness drapes the sky in silence deepThe final sun begins its sleepNo voice remains, no breath, no lightJust echoes fading into nightBeneath the rain that's stained with blackNo light breaks through the cloudy trackI take a step through all my doubtI follow memories through hazeBut sorrow’s all that ever staysI follow memories through hazeThe time has comeWhen the black sun starts to riseShadows swallow hopeful skiesHearts grow silent, lost in fireAshes rise to crown the pyreWhen the black sun starts to riseThe world will meet its own demiseNo one can escape the fateDoom resounds — it’s far too late
thumb.last_res_body: うぽつ！！ 888888888 うぽつです カッケェ 全部かっこいい！ うぽつです！💜 Djent!!! いいねー かっけ〜
